column5: The MSc Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a conversion MSc, designed for students from a broad range of disciplines who wish to enhance their existing knowledge and skills in order to open up career opportunities in AI.
column7: Home - Full-time - £8395 per year Home -Part-time - £4198 per year International - Full-time - £15450 per year
column9: 14 months full time, 28 months part time
